## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style (ESLint + Prettier)
- [ ] I have run `just lint` and `just format` locally
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments where appropriate

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] New and existing tests pass locally with `just test`
- [ ] I have tested on Node.js 22+ (native WebSocket)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG if applicable
